reason.raw: Make a new one with ignition transport service
reason.html: Make a new one with ignition transport service

description.raw:
* sensor msg can not be serialized it seems.

* world plugins list. still failures.

* implemented sensor properties + uniqueness with uris. Added test, fails.

* resolved merge lines.

* removed two printf/qdebug commands.

* show world plugins in world tab. Problem: initTransport not initialized.

* uncomment function.

* cleared code according to style. Removed plugin related stuff, etc. Changes according to comments.

* removed duplicate mItem check. See comment Louise line 254.

* cleaned code from plugins and checked code style. Test still fails.

* changed verify 3 items instead of 2 in SensorProperties TEST. Still fails.

* changed test world to imu. test still fails, Models is not getting selected.

* inserted check for requestpublish.

* messge for listing properties gets delivered. But crashed after click on a world plugin.

* changed boost mutex to std.

* fixes sensortest.

* added test. innerxml comparison fails.

* added new plugin msg.

* Show World Plugins, if any exist.
